sentences.en: A love of junk food, television and computer games has sent the country's waistline ballooning, with Australians weighing in as the world's second fattest nation after the United States.
sentences.cn: 对垃圾食品、电视和电脑游戏的爱好使这个国家的腰围像气球一般鼓胀起来，澳洲人已经成了仅次于美国人的世界第二肥胖民族。

sentences.en: Since the modest start, many interesting characters have filled the pages of ballooning history.
sentences.cn: 自从这次简易的起步以来, 在乘气球升空的历史篇章中充满了许多有趣的人物.

sentences.en: They like to go ballooning at weekends.
sentences.cn: 他们周末喜欢乘气球玩.

sentences.en: Visitors can see objects important in the history of ballooning.
sentences.cn: 参观者可以看到在热气球史上的重要物品.

sentences.en: We will be ballooning over the lake after lunch.
sentences.cn: 午饭过后我们将乘坐气球飞过湖泊.

words.tran_cn: 使像气球般鼓起；使激增

phrases.tran_cn: [外科学]气囊血管成形术；球囊成形术（等于percutaneous transluminal angioplasty）
毫无效果，毫无作用(意指如铅气球无法飞升)
